articles.title: Covid-19 global updates: France and Greece mandate vaccinations for health workers amid delta variant surge - The Washington Post
articles.description: The two European countries also announced new restrictions that would require proof of vaccination to take part in certain activities.
articles.content:
The equation is simple. The more we vaccinate, the less space we leave this virus to circulate, he said.
Health Minister Olivier Véran said that health-care workers must now be inoculated by Sep. 15… [+2645 chars]

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: UK, European manufacturers want battery supply chain nearer home: Survey - CNA
articles.description: British manufacturers and those in other parts of Europe want to move more of the supply chain for batteries used in electric cars and renewable energy away from China and closer to their plants, a survey showed on Tuesday (Jul 12).
articles.content: LONDON: British manufacturers and those in other parts of Europe want to move more of the supply chain for batteries used in electric cars and renewable energy away from China and closer to their pla… [+1424 chars]

articles.title: Here's what Toronto's Little Italy looked like in the moments after the Euro 2020 final - CBC.ca
articles.description: Italy won the European Championship for the second time by beating England 3-2 on penalties on Sunday. Here in Toronto, St. Clair Avenue West and College Street erupted in celebrations as large crowds of fans waved flags, cheered and chanted.

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Flu jab protects against some of the severe effects of COVID-19, including ICU admissions, sepsis and strokes - Medical Xpress
articles.description: The flu vaccine may provide vital protection against COVID-19, new research being presented at the European Congress of Clinical Microbiology & Infectious Diseases (ECCMID), held online this year, concludes.
